items.title: Deep Work
items.summary: This is super important while (alive): work() But this is not quite right. We must also work deeply while we are alive to lead to a satisfying life. We want depth in all areas.
items.content_html:
This is super important 

while (alive):
    work()

But this is not quite right. We must also work deeply while we are alive to lead to a satisfying life. We want depth in all areas.
